subject: Concussions
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After A’s pitcher Brandon McCarthy took a line drive to the head last month, it was jarring to see the Tigers’ Doug Fister absorb a liner off his head in Game 2 of the World Series — and stay in the game.
snippet: After A’s pitcher Brandon McCarthy took a line drive to the head last month, it was jarring to see the Tigers’ Doug Fister absorb a liner off his head in Game 2 of the World Series — and stay in the game.
